title: My phone will connect to WiFi and the Internet just fine, but will give me the error "No Internet"
content:
YouTube, Reddit, etc works just fine, I am just getting the error for no apparent reason.

I believe this is because I have a custom home network with a very strict firewall. What port/protocol do I have to allow through to allow my phone to "phone home" and realize that it has connection to the internet.

For further detail I have an extended ACL on a Cisco router that basically only allows echo-replies, established TCP traffic, and enough UDP for my ISP to send my router a DHCP address (bootpc and bootps)
